info.title: Security Center
info.description: API spec for Microsoft.Security (Azure Security Center) resource provider

get.description: Gets the list of all possible traffic between resources for the subscription

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: Gets the list of all possible traffic between resources for the subscription and location.

parameters.name: ascLocation
parameters.description: The location where ASC stores the data of the subscription. can be retrieved from Get locations

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

get.description: Gets the list of all possible traffic between resources for the subscription and location, based on connection type.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group within the user's subscription. The name is case insensitive.

parameters.name: ascLocation
parameters.description: The location where ASC stores the data of the subscription. can be retrieved from Get locations

parameters.name: connectionType
parameters.description: The type of allowed connections (Internal, External)

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page.

AllowedConnectionsList.description: List of all possible traffic between Azure resources

AllowedConnectionsResource.description: The resource whose properties describes the allowed traffic between Azure resources

location.description: Location where the resource is stored

allOf.description: Describes an Azure resource with location

calculatedDateTime.description: The UTC time on which the allowed connections resource was calculated

AllowedConnectionsResourceProperties.description: Describes the allowed traffic between Azure resources

inboundConnectedResources.description: The list of Azure resources that the resource has inbound allowed connection from

outboundConnectedResources.description: The list of Azure resources that the resource has outbound allowed connection to

ConnectableResource.description: Describes the allowed inbound and outbound traffic of an Azure resource

connectedResourceId.description: The Azure resource id of the connected resource

ConnectedResource.description: Describes properties of a connected resource

ConnectionType.name: connectionType
ConnectionType.description: The type of allowed connections (Internal, External)
